content: Glad to see you here. My name is Dima Radushev. I create visual communications with people and for people. I designed and developed this website to help you find info easily about my skills and services. Hope it will be useful journey for you.
These numbers are reflection of my activity, attitude and passion which I carried through all projects I was involved in a few years.
Do you have an idea for a business or own project? Just choose the service you need, and I'll create a visual and functional implementation.
My main advantage is a human-centered approach in production and communication. As a result, it gives rise to all others advantages.
Here you can find some projects I was involved. Visit page with details to find more information about the project you like.
Landing page web design for a startup application development company.
Web design for an e-commerce project that specializes in sports equipment.
Landing page web design for a company which provides detailing services.
Promo website design for one of the largest manufacturers of public transport.
Represent to you with honor brands and companies I worked with. They are professionals and leaders in their sectors of business.
